column4: hi guys
i have updated my system to edgy and now the system can not run the Xserver
what video card do you have
again what video card do you have
it is onboard intel, and sorry i am in text base i didn't see ur message
it's ok
the output of your xorg.conf needs to be changed -
is your computer using a flatpanel external monitor, or is this a laptop
it is a flatpanel ... Samsusng syncmaster
do you know how can i solve this? :)
edit xorg.conf
I know your not real familar with vi <-- software to edit files
what should i change? , Melio i use and love vim :)
there may be an xorg config script
i searched for xorg.conf no such file on my system
it's always in /etc/X11/
oh, yes it is there :"> what should i change then?
this would be a lot easyer if i ran ubuntu :P
scroll down and find stuff that looks liek video card configs
there is a big part dedicated to monitor written syncmaster and having alot of modes like 1024x768 etc. depth and also graphic card info
change all the modes to 800x600
done! should i kill and run gdm now?
i tried: sudo gdm and sudo Xorg same problem again in both cases :(
